00097 #ifndef __TOMMYLIST_H
00098 #define __TOMMYLIST_H
00099 
00100 #include "tommytypes.h"
00101 
00102 /******************************************************************************/
00103 /* list */
00104 
00108 typedef tommy_node* tommy_list;
00109 
00114 tommy_inline void tommy_list_init(tommy_list* list)
00115 {
00116         *list = 0;
00117 }
00118 
00123 tommy_inline tommy_node* tommy_list_head(tommy_list* list)
00124 {
00125         return *list;
00126 }
00127 
00132 tommy_inline tommy_node* tommy_list_tail(tommy_list* list)
00133 {
00134         tommy_node* head = tommy_list_head(list);
00135 
00136         if (!head)
00137                 return 0;
00138 
00139         return head->prev;
00140 }
00141 
00147 tommy_inline void tommy_list_insert_first(tommy_list* list, tommy_node* node)
00148 {
00149         /* one element "circular" prev list */
00150         node->prev = node;
00151 
00152         /* one element "0 terminated" next list */
00153         node->next = 0;
00154 
00155         *list = node;
00156 }
00157 
00164 tommy_inline void tommy_list_insert_head_not_empty(tommy_list* list, tommy_node* node)
00165 {
00166         tommy_node* head = tommy_list_head(list);
00167 
00168         /* insert in the "circular" prev list */
00169         node->prev = head->prev;
00170         head->prev = node;
00171 
00172         /* insert in the "0 terminated" next list */
00173         node->next = head;
00174 
00175         *list = node;
00176 }
00177 
00184 tommy_inline void tommy_list_insert_tail_not_empty(tommy_node* head, tommy_node* node)
00185 {
00186         /* insert in the "circular" prev list */
00187         node->prev = head->prev;
00188         head->prev = node;
00189 
00190         /* insert in the "0 terminated" next list */
00191         node->next = 0;
00192         node->prev->next = node;
00193 }
00194 
00200 tommy_inline void tommy_list_insert_head(tommy_list* list, tommy_node* node, void* data)
00201 {
00202         tommy_node* head = tommy_list_head(list);
00203 
00204         if (head)
00205                 tommy_list_insert_head_not_empty(list, node);
00206         else
00207                 tommy_list_insert_first(list, node);
00208 
00209         node->data = data;
00210 }
00211 
00217 tommy_inline void tommy_list_insert_tail(tommy_list* list, tommy_node* node, void* data)
00218 {
00219         tommy_node* head = tommy_list_head(list);
00220 
00221         if (head)
00222                 tommy_list_insert_tail_not_empty(head, node);
00223         else
00224                 tommy_list_insert_first(list, node);
00225 
00226         node->data = data;
00227 }
00228 
00234 tommy_inline tommy_node* tommy_list_remove_head_not_empty(tommy_list* list)
00235 {
00236         tommy_node* head = tommy_list_head(list);
00237 
00238         /* remove from the "circular" prev list */
00239         head->next->prev = head->prev;
00240 
00241         /* remove from the "0 terminated" next list */
00242         *list = head->next; /* the new head, in case 0 */
00243 
00244         return head;
00245 }
00246 
00255 tommy_inline void* tommy_list_remove_existing(tommy_list* list, tommy_node* node)
00256 {
00257         tommy_node* head = tommy_list_head(list);
00258 
00259         /* remove from the "circular" prev list */
00260         if (node->next)
00261                 node->next->prev = node->prev;
00262         else
00263                 head->prev = node->prev; /* the last */
00264 
00265         /* remove from the "0 terminated" next list */
00266         if (head == node)
00267                 *list = node->next; /* the new head, in case 0 */
00268         else
00269                 node->prev->next = node->next;
00270 
00271         return node->data;
00272 }
00273 
00281 tommy_inline void tommy_list_concat(tommy_list* first, tommy_list* second)
00282 {
00283         tommy_node* first_head;
00284         tommy_node* first_tail;
00285         tommy_node* second_head;
00286 
00287         /* if the second is empty, nothing to do */
00288         second_head = tommy_list_head(second);
00289         if (second_head == 0)
00290                 return;
00291 
00292         /* if the first is empty, copy the second */
00293         first_head = tommy_list_head(first);
00294         if (first_head == 0) {
00295                 *first = *second;
00296                 return;
00297         }
00298 
00299         /* tail of the first list */
00300         first_tail = first_head->prev;
00301 
00302         /* set the "circular" prev list */
00303         first_head->prev = second_head->prev;
00304         second_head->prev = first_tail;
00305 
00306         /* set the "0 terminated" next list */
00307         first_tail->next = second_head;
00308 }
00309 
00317 void tommy_list_sort(tommy_list* list, tommy_compare_func* cmp);
00318 
00323 tommy_inline tommy_bool_t tommy_list_empty(tommy_list* list)
00324 {
00325         return tommy_list_head(list) == 0;
00326 }
00327 
00332 tommy_inline tommy_count_t tommy_list_count(tommy_list* list)
00333 {
00334         tommy_count_t count = 0;
00335         tommy_node* i = tommy_list_head(list);
00336 
00337         while (i) {
00338                 ++count;
00339                 i = i->next;
00340         }
00341 
00342         return count;
00343 }
00344 
00373 tommy_inline void tommy_list_foreach(tommy_list* list, tommy_foreach_func* func)
00374 {
00375         tommy_node* node = tommy_list_head(list);
00376 
00377         while (node) {
00378                 void* data = node->data;
00379                 node = node->next;
00380                 func(data);
00381         }
00382 }
00383 
00387 tommy_inline void tommy_list_foreach_arg(tommy_list* list, tommy_foreach_arg_func* func, void* arg)
00388 {
00389         tommy_node* node = tommy_list_head(list);
00390 
00391         while (node) {
00392                 void* data = node->data;
00393                 node = node->next;
00394                 func(arg, data);
00395         }
00396 }
